description: AMD Instinct MI300 (CDNA3) hardware instruction information based on ISA documentation

latency_rules.description: Latency rules from Table 37 (VOP3P-Matrix Opcodes Required NOPs)

non_dlops_valu_to_mfma.description: Non-DLops VALU Write VGPR -> V_MFMA* read VGPR

dlops_same_opcode_srcc_forwarding.description: DLops Write VGPR -> Same DLops read VGPR as SrcC
dlops_same_opcode_srcc_forwarding.comment: Supports same opcode DLops back-to-back SrcC forwarding for accumulation

dlops_same_opcode_srcab.description: DLops Write VGPR -> Same DLops read VGPR as SrcA/B
dlops_same_opcode_srcab.comment: Does not support SrcA/B forwarding in DLops

dlops_different_opcode.description: DLops Write VGPR -> Different opcode read/write VGPR (RAW + WAW)
dlops_different_opcode.comment: Disable all forwarding path from DLops to normal VALU/VM/LDS/FLAT ops

xdl_to_srcc_exact_same.description: XDL/V_SMFMA* Write VGPR -> XDL read VGPR as SrcC exactly same with 1st vDst
xdl_to_srcc_exact_same.comment: The two V_MFMA must be the same number passes and vDst/vSrc same offset

xdl_to_srcc_overlapped.description: XDL/V_SMFMA* Write VGPR -> XDL read VGPR as SrcC overlapped with 1st vDst

xdl_to_sgemm_dgemm_srcc.description: XDL/V_SMFMA* Write VGPR -> S/DGEMM read VGPR as SrcC

xdl_to_mfma_srcab.description: XDL/V_SMFMA* Write VGPR -> V_MFMA read VGPR as SrcA or SrcB
xdl_to_mfma_srcab.comment: No internal forwarding path waits for previous V_MFMA commit result to VGPR

xdl_to_valu_vm_lds_flat.description: XDL/V_SMFMA* Write VGPR -> VM/L/GDS/FLAT/Export Read VGPR or VALU read/write VGPR (RAW + WAW)
xdl_to_valu_vm_lds_flat.comment: Includes v_accvgpr_read which is VALU read

sgemm_to_srcc_exact_same.description: SGEMM Write VGPR -> XDL read VGPR as SrcC exactly same with 1st vDst
sgemm_to_srcc_exact_same.comment: The two V_MFMA must be the same number passes

sgemm_to_srcc_overlapped.description: SGEMM Write VGPR -> XDL read VGPR as SrcC overlapped with 1st vDst

sgemm_to_sgemm_dgemm_srcc.description: SGEMM Write VGPR -> S/DGEMM read VGPR as SrcC

sgemm_to_mfma_srcab.description: SGEMM Write VGPR -> V_MFMA read VGPR as SrcA or SrcB

sgemm_to_valu_vm_lds_flat.description: SGEMM Write VGPR -> VM/L/GDS/FLAT/Export Read VGPR or VALU read/write VGPR (RAW + WAW)
sgemm_to_valu_vm_lds_flat.comment: Includes v_accvgpr_read which is VALU read

dgemm_16x16x4_to_same_srcc.description: V_MFMA_16x16x4_F64 Write VGPR -> V_MFMA_16x16x4_F64 read SrcC exactly same
dgemm_16x16x4_to_same_srcc.comment: The two V_MFMA must be the same number passes

dgemm_16x16x4_to_srcc_overlapped.description: V_MFMA_16x16x4_F64 Write VGPR -> S/DGEMM read SrcC overlapped

dgemm_16x16x4_to_xdl_srcc.description: V_MFMA_16x16x4_F64 Write VGPR -> XDL read SrcC overlapped

dgemm_16x16x4_to_srcab.description: V_MFMA_16x16x4_F64 Write VGPR -> read VGPR as SrcA or SrcB

dgemm_16x16x4_to_valu.description: V_MFMA_16x16x4_F64 Write VGPR -> VALU read/write VGPR (RAW + WAW)

dgemm_16x16x4_to_vm_lds_flat.description: V_MFMA_16x16x4_F64 Write VGPR -> VM/L/GDS/FLAT/Export Read VGPR

dgemm_4x4x4_to_same_srcc.description: V_MFMA_4x4x4_F64 Write VGPR -> V_MFMA_4x4x4_F64 read SrcC exactly same
dgemm_4x4x4_to_same_srcc.comment: 4x4x4 needs accumulation, write VGPR is later than normal XDL 4x4x4

dgemm_4x4x4_to_srcc_overlapped.description: V_MFMA_4x4x4_F64 Write VGPR -> S/DGEMM read SrcC overlapped

dgemm_4x4x4_to_xdl_srcc.description: V_MFMA_4x4x4_F64 Write VGPR -> XDL read SrcC overlapped

dgemm_4x4x4_to_srcab.description: V_MFMA_4x4x4_F64 Write VGPR -> read VGPR as SrcA or SrcB

dgemm_4x4x4_to_valu.description: V_MFMA_4x4x4_F64 Write VGPR -> VALU read/write VGPR (RAW + WAW)

dgemm_4x4x4_to_vm_lds_flat.description: V_MFMA_4x4x4_F64 Write VGPR -> VM/L/GDS/FLAT/Export Read VGPR

vcmpx_to_mfma.comment: CDNA doesn't support execution mask forwarding with XDL/DGEMM

mfma_srcc_to_valu_war.description: XDL/SMFMA Read VGPR SrcC -> VALU write VGPR (WAR) Co-Execution Anti-Dependency

snop_info.comment: s_nop N waits for N+1 cycles. s_nop 0 = 1 cycle wait.
